choices: the pack is your family (Like you were a wolf your whole life.)
1.content:
You smell the fresh sent of pine trees and think your mom must have changed the air freshner in your room.
It's saturday and you intend to sleep throgh most of it.
But for some reason you incline your self to get up.
You open your eyes and are in the middel of a forest.
still asleep you don't quite get it.
You walk to where you bathroom would be but you bump in to some one.
Fully awake you see a pack of wolfs staring at you.
"There you are," alitel pup says.
You look down at your hands but insted are staring at big fluffy paws.
"Weve been looking all over for you," an older one says
"who are you?"
1.title: wake up

11.content:
"Honey, It...it's us," says a black wolf as she steps forward from the group.
"I'm sorry, who?" you ask, attempting to remeber who they are.
"Your famy broder," whines a smaller white wolf as she takes he place next to her mother.
"yea bro," agrees another. he is gray and looks about the same age as you.
"I...I'm sorry, I...I just," you stutter out.
"Oh how i just love family reunions." says a voice from behind you.
A dark wolf passes you.
11.title: runiune

choices: It's a joshing response you weren't expecting
This contact leads to an unfortunate fight
14.content:
And then they howl with laughter.

"Sounds like a pup question, 'Who ARE you?' The snarliest laugh comes from the snout of the gray male standing just an inch taller than the others.

His left paw rears up in a swipe to your thickly furred shoulder. You wince in anticipation of the black claws so apparent from the lead of his heavy paw.
14.title: You're joking, right?

choices: "I'm not really your friend," She wispers silently in your ear and walks away
142.content:
"LAY YOUR OAWS OFF HIM!" A voice shouts out from the bushes. Soon a totaly white wolf jumps out and lands on the male. After they start russling around, more wolfs, black instead, jumped out and started attacking the other black wolfs in the ones army.
You are backing away and bump into another. You swivel round and realize you are facing a female gray wolf. You back away and she advances. You soon find your self amonge the fight. She swings at you and you duck. She takels you and the two of you begine russling around in the mud.
"Retreate," orders the Male leader and the others run after him. The others start yealing in tryumph. The girl gets off you and helps you to your feet.
"wait your my friend?" you ask, surprised by your own voice.
"duh!"
"Then why did you attack me!"
142.title: the fight

info.brief_description: you wake up as a wolf. what else do you need to know.
